content.description: SDS and follow left leaning crack to good holds. Set up and dyno for huge jug.
content.location: middle of the wide orange face. obvious left leaning crack. This cliff is about a 5 min hike down the cliffband towards iceberg from the parking area. just past a break in the band.

content.description: SDS on small crimps and poor feet in the middle of the face. Cruxy pull into a small crimper pocket and higher right hand side pull. After gaining the good deep edges up and left of the start either a. continue the trend slightly left and finish direct up to a hairball mantle (V6), or b. trend right to topout over BoulderCliff R via the dyno to the slot (V5+).
content.location: middle of the wide orange face. Left of the obvious right leaning crack. This cliff is about a 5 min hike down the cliffband towards iceberg from the parking area. just past a break in the band.

content.description: Stand start with right hand pinch/undercling. Move left into improbable slopers and hit the jug at the base of a crack. Top out on big holds.
content.location: left side of the wide orange face. This cliff is about a 5 min hike down the cliffband towards iceberg from the parking area. just past a break in the band.
